3.name: PART 9 - PARKS, RECREATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS
3.label: part

full_text:
Within sixty (60) days after the passage of this ordinance the City Manager shall cause to be created an administrative process to guide the various City contracting departments as to how each is to interact in the per cent for public art process. 
(Ord. No. 2009-563, §2, 3-17-09, eff. 7-1-09)

0.text:
Within sixty (60) days after the passage of this ordinance the City Manager shall cause to be created an administrative process to guide the various City contracting departments as to how each is to interact in the per cent for public art process.

3.name: PART 9 - PARKS, RECREATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS
3.label: part

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

ADMINISTRATIVE ACTION. (§ 9-10011)

Within sixty (60) days after the passage of this ordinance the City Manager
shall cause to be created an administrative process to guide the various City
contracting departments as to how each is to interact in the per cent for public
art process. 
(Ord. No. 2009-563, §2, 3-17-09, eff. 7-1-09)
